headline.print_headline: Allianz Could Face Hundreds of Billions in Outflows on Gross Exit - Morningstar
headline.main: Allianz Could Face Hundreds of Billions in Outflows on Gross Exit - Morningstar

lead_paragraph: Bill Gross's departure from investment firm Pimco could lead investors to pull hundreds of billions of dollars in assets from its parent company and invest them with Janus Capital Group, the rival firm that Gross is joining, a Morningstar analyst said Friday.
